Class Sales

java.lang.Object
  Sales
All Implemented Interfaces:
Iterable<Order>
public class Sales
extends Object
implements Iterable<Order>

This class models a list of orders that have been sold. It contains a collection of Order objects.

Version:
1.0.0
Author:
iCarnegie
See Also:
Order
